title: luxury houses for sale in panadura.
description:
Luxury Houses for Sale in Panadura. 
 
In Kalutara District, Panadura, Luxury House situated, 1Km away from Colombo - Old Galle Road, as well as close to Moratuwa & Panadura towns. Located in calm, quiet, environment with all facilities. Property is located in upper middle class residential area of Paratta Village, with a view of “Bolgoda Lake”. The land has frontage to 20ft. wide Pradeshiya Sabha road. Electricity, Telecom telephone lines, Pipe-borne Water service are available up to the land. Distance for Old Colombo-Galle road is about 1Km. 
Mini Bazaar, Market, main Post Office, Banks, leading Schools (Gov. & International), Hospital, Food Cities, Filling Centers and Commercial outlets Police Station are at Keselwatte with in 1Km, All other important places are at Moratuwa within radius of 3Km. 
Very close to Aqva Pearl Hotel Complex and School.  
 
3320 sq.ft, a split type house (Ground floor ), with a beautiful front and  side elevation, with a landscaped garden. This beautifully designed structure, designed onto elevations with living and dining area, an integrated  pantry and kitchen,  Bed rooms with attached bathroom & toilet, open veranda etc. 
  
2nd floor is consisting 3 bedrooms, bathroom & toilet, indoor & outdoor balcony etc. 3rd floor is use for enjoying and recreation. Bathroom , Toilet and bedroom there.  
 
4th floor use for your leisure time. Clear deed with beautiful eye-catching area. Ideal for a Tourist, Holiday Resort Bungalow or someone loving apeaceful living space.    
Contact directly if genuinely interested. sS 
 
Location : Kandy (Heeressagala).

පානදුර හා මොරටුව නගර වලට නුදුරින් පර්චස්  11.90ක් සමග සුඛෝපභෝගී මහල් නිවසක් විකිණීමට.  
 
කළුතර, පානදුර, පැරණි කොළඹ - ගාල්ල ප්‍රධාන මාර්ගයට සමීපව ගොරකාන, ගල්කණුව හන්දියට සමීපව “බොල්ගොඩ ගාර්ඩන්ස් “හි පර්චස් 13 ක් සමග සුඛෝපභෝගී මහල් නිවසක් විකිණීමට ඇත.  ඉහළ මධ්‍යම පාන්තික නිවාස වලින් යුත් බොල්ගොඩ ගංතෙර මනා ලෙස දසුන් වන සුවදායක, නිදහස් මනරම් වටපිටාවක පිහිටි ස්ථානයකි. මෙම ස්ථානයේ සිට මොරටුව නගරයට කි.මී. 3 ක් ද, පානදුර නගරයට කි.මී. 2 ක් ද වන අතර පැරණි කොළඹ - ගාල්ල පාරට කිලෝමීටර එකකි. නිවස ප්‍රාදේශීය සභා අඩි 20 ක පාරට මුහුණලා පිහිටා ඇත. මෙම ස්ථානය අක්වා පර්ල් සංචාරක හෝටලයට යාබදව පිහිටා ඇත. විදුලිය, නල ජලය, ටෙලිකොම් දුරකතන සහ අන්තර්ජාල පහසුකම්, පුළුල් මංමාවත් වලින් යුක්තයි.  
 
සිව් මහල් නිවසක් ලෙස ඉදිකර ඇති මෙම නිවස වර්ග අඩි 3,320 කි. මෙහි බිම් මහල නිදන කාමරයක්, නාන කාමරය, විශාල සාලය සහිත කෑම කාමරය, පැන්ට්‍රිය සහිත මුළුතැන්ගෙය ආදියෙන් සමන්විතයි. දෙවන මහල නිදන කාමර 3, බුදු මැදුර, ඇතුළත හා පිටත බැල්කනි, නාන කාමරය සහිත වැසිකිළියකින් යුක්තය. තෙවන මහල උත්සව හෝ නෙත් ප්‍රියසම්භාෂණයකදී විනෝදවීම සදහා භාවිත කළ හැකි අයුරින් ඉදිකර ඇත. එහි නිදන කාමරයක් සහ නාන කාමරයක් ඇත. සිවිවන මහල විවේක කාලය සදහා භාවිත කළ හැකි අතර මෙහි වහල ඉදිකර නැත. මෙම මහලේ සිට කොළඹ නගරය ඇතුළු වටපිටාව මනරම් ලෙස දර්ශනයවේ.  
 
උසාවිය සංකීර්ණය, විහාරස්ථාන, දුම්රිය ස්ථානය, කෙසෙල්වත්ත පොලිස් ස්ථානය, රාජ්‍ය ආයතන, බස් නැවතුම්පල, බැංකු, තැපැල් කාර්යාලය, මහ නගරසභාව, ප්‍රධාන රෝහල් (රජයේ සහ පුද්ගලික රෝහල්), පුඩ් සිටි, ඉන්ධන පිරවුම් හල්, වෙළඳ පොල, සාප්පු සංකීර්ණ ආදී ස්ථාන වලට ද නුදුරු ස්ථානයකි. නිස්කලංක මනරම් වටපිටාවකින් ද සමන්විත වැදගත් පරිසරයක පිහිටා ඇති මෙම ස්ථානය සංචාරක කලාපයක පිහිටා ඇත. නවීන පන්නයට නිමවා ඇති මෙම නිවාස  සංචාරක ව්‍යාපාරයකට, නිවාඩු නිකේතනයකට හෝ නිස්කලංකත්වය අපේක්ෂා කරන අයට පදිංචියට වඩාත් සුදුසු ස්ථානයකි.  
 
බැංකු ණය ලබාගත හැකි පිරිසිදු ඔප්පු සහිතයි. 
 
මිල : මිල සාකච්ඡා කරගත හැකිය.

අනුරාධපුර දිස්ත්‍රික්කයේ, අනුරාධපුර නගරයේ ප්‍රධාන පාරට සහ දහයියාගම හන්දියට නුදුරින් (මීටර 100) පුබුදු මාවතෙන් (1 වන පටුමග) පර්චස් 26 ක ඉඩම සමග නිවස වහාම විකිණේ. මෙම ස්ථානයට ආසන්නව ජනප්‍රිය පාසල් (ඩී.එස්.සේනානායක විද්‍යාලය), ප්‍රාදේශීය මහ ලේකම් කාර්යාලය, පොලිස් ස්ථානය, මහ රෝහල, පෞද්ගලික රෝහල් ආදී ස්ථාන වලටත් නුදුරින් මෙම ස්ථානය පිහිටා ඇත. තවද අනුරාධපුර බස් නැවතුම්පල, ප්‍රධාන පෙළේ බැංකු, තැපැල් කාර්යාලය, රෝහල, පුඩ් සිටි, ඉන්ධන පිරවුම් හල්, වෙළඳ පොල ආදී ස්ථාන වලට ද නුදුරු ස්ථානයකි. වර්ග අඩි 2500 පමණ වන නිවස නිදන කාමර 4, සාලය, කෑම කාමරය, මුළුතැන්ගෙය, විවෘත ආලින්දය, යාබද නාන කාමර 2  සහ වැසිකිළිය ආදියෙන්  සමන්විතයි. විදුලිය, නල ජලය, දුරකතන පහසුකම් ආදී සියළු යටිතල පහසුකම් වලින් සමන්විත පදිංචියට සුදුසු මනරම් වටපිටාවකින් යුත් වැදගත් ස්ථානයකි. බැංකු ණය ලබාගත හැකි පිරිසිදු ඔප්පු සහිතයි. පදිංචියට මෙන්ම ආයෝජනයට ද කදිමයි. 
 
මෙමඉඩම සම්පූර්ණයෙන් හෝ පර්චස් 12 සහ 14 වශයෙන් මිලදීගත හැකිය. 
නිවස සහිත බිම් කොටස පර්චස් 1ක මිල රු. 600,000/= කි. 
නිවස රහිත බිම් කොටස පර්චස් 1 ක මිල රු. 550,000/= කි. 
ඉහත මිල ගණන් පරීක්ෂා කිරීමෙන් පසු සාකච්ඡා කරගත හැක.

පානදුර නගර මධ්‍යයයෙන් සියළු නාගරික පහසුකම් සහිත වටිනා ඉඩමක් පරණි නිවසක් සමග වහාම විකිණේ. 
පානදුර, නගර මධ්‍යයයෙන් සියළු පහසුකම් සහිත පර්චස් 14.5 ක වටිනා ඉඩම සමග පැරණි නිවස වහාම විකිණේ. පානදුර - රත්නපුර (හොරණ) මාර්ගයේ පානදුර ශ්‍රී සුමංගල (පිරිමි) විද්‍යාලය ඉදිරිපිට මෙම ස්ථානය පිහිටා ඇත. පානදුර රජයේ රෝහලට, බස් නැවතුම්පලට සහ ජනප්‍රිය පාසල් වන පානදුර ශ්‍රී සුමංගල (ගැහැණු) විද්‍යාලය, රෝයල් විද්‍යාලය, පානදුර බාලිකා විද්‍යාලය, අගමැති විද්‍යාලය ආදී ජාතික සහ මධ්‍ය විද්‍යාලය වලට ද මැදිව පිහිටා ඇති නිසා (මීටර 800 ක් පමණ ඇතුළත) පහසුවෙන් ළඟාවිය හැකිය. දක්ෂිණ අධිවේගී බණ්ඩාරගම අන්තර් පිවිසුම් ස්ථානයට මිනිත්තු 10 කින් ගමන් කළ හැකිය. ප්‍රධාන පෙළේ බැංකු, වෙළඳ පොළ, පුඩ් සිටි, ඉන්ධන පිරවුම් හල්, රාජ්‍ය ආයතන, උසාවි සංකීර්ණය, පොලිස් ස්ථානය මෙන්ම රාජ්‍ය හා පෞද්ගලික ආයතන රැසකට ද ආසන්නය. වාණිජමය වටිනාකමකින් සහ උසස් ජීවන රටාවකින් සමන්විත ස්ථානයකි. තෙකලා විදුලිය, ළිං හා නල ජලය, දුරකතන, පුළුල් මං මාවත්, ආදී යටිතල පහසුකම් වලින් ද සමන්විත නිදහස් පදිංවියටත් ව්‍යාපාරයකයටත් සුදුසු ස්ථානයක් ද වේ. කලාතුරකින් ලැබෙන ආයෝජනයක් මෙන්ම සහ පානදුර නගරයෙන් හොඳම ස්ථානයකි. වර්ග අඩි 1500 ක් පමණ පැරණි නිවස නිදන කාමර, සාලය, කෑම කාමරය, මුළුතැන්ගෙය ආදියෙන් යුක්තයි. එහෙත් නිවස ඇතහැර ඉඩමේ වටිනාකමට පමණක් විකිණේ. ඉක්මනින් විකිණේ. ඉඩමේ සැලසුම් සදහා නගර සභා අනුමැතිය ලබා ඇත. 
මිල : රු:  ලක්ෂ 115 කි (මිල සාකච්ඡා කරගත හැකිය).

title: container conversions by mclarens logistics ltd.
description:
We are pleased to bring to your kind notice the services offered by the McLarens Logistics Group, Sri Lanka; Container Trading and Container Conversions are two key activities in which we have developed a remarkable expertise and outstanding service level over several years of pioneering work. 
 
As a pioneer Marine Container Depot Operator established in 1979 in Sri Lanka, we understand container deployment like no other company and are able to offer a range of general purpose and special containers for outright purchase. Our access to container stocks from global suppliers allows us to offer you preferential rates and a timely service delivery to any part of the country. These containers also serve multiple uses such as mobile storage or functional units at economical prices.   
 
As we are keen to promote sales of our empty containers and portable cabin products to your organisation, we would be grateful if you would kindly pass this mail and attachments to the relevant Officer for review; 
 
Our products include – 
 
•         20ftGP, 40ftGP, 40ftHC Empty Containers 
•         20ft & 40ft Flat Rack Containers 
•         20ft & 40ftHC Refrigerated Containers 
•         20ft ISO Tanks (liquid) 
•         20ft & 40ftGP/HC Converted Containers – accommodation units, office units, bathrooms, kitchens, Cafés, guard rooms, combined units etc. 
•         4ftx4ft Toilet units   
 
You may contact undersigned for price quotations etc.

Situated At; (Location in Google Earth;  7.286044444 N ,  80.71985556 E) -

10Km away from Kandy city towards Dalada Maligawa Road (BOI Junction) and 200m away from the Main Road. Only about 15 minute drive to the Kandy city center. 
Walking distance to Pallekele International Cricket Stadium as well as the BOI Zone (Board of Investments), International Schools, supermarkets, banks, Central provincial Council, Many other Government Institutions, gasoline stations etc. Also 08 km away from the Victoria Golf grounds.

The house consists of a car porch for two cars, a spacious sit out verandah on the front, a spacious sitting & dining area, office room, four bed rooms including a spacious master bed room & a spacious visitors room with two common bathrooms kitchen and pantry cupboards with quality wood, two utility rooms, TV lounge, 03 balconies and a separate toilet outside. Free from Natural Disasters.

30-20 foot wide access road from the main road.  
Suitable for foreigners too.

title: code no 2693-bungalow lease,-col-03
description:
A FOUR BED ROOMED (TWO STORIED) COLONIAL BUNGALOW IN HEART OF COLOMBO-COLOMBO-03-FOR LEASE 
 
LOCATION 
 
This well maintained luxury & spacious colonial type bungalow is situated in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential & well secured convenient location  in the heart of Colombo (off Duplication road) with close proximity to supermarkets,shopping malls, leading International & local schools, also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc, it is only about fifteen minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location.  
 
DESCRIPTION 
 
It is an architect designed luxury & spacious two storied bungalow,the ground floor consists of a spacious verandah, a spacious sitting & dinning room, one bed room with an attached bathroom, an elegant pantry area,a separate kitchen area & a servant room with a separate toilet as well as a separate drivers room outside. 
 
The upper floor consists of a sitting area cum TV lounge, three bed rooms including a spacious master bed room with an attached bathroom, another common bathroom. 
 
GARDEN 
 
It has a medium sized landscaped front garden area & a medium sized landscaped rear garden area, surrounded by a high parapet wall with steel gates facing the main road as well as the private road, for the entrances. 
 
FACILITIES 
 
The bungalow consists of Brown, green & red  cemented flooring, has three phase electricity supply with two air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for all of the areas,has pipe borne water supply with hot water supply with an overhead tank for storage, all of the doors, windows are made using Teak wood, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware, the ground & upper floors consists of high roofed White ceiling,the bungalow is well maintained & is solidly built using quality material.

description:
A THREE BED ROOMED LUXURY AND SPACIOUS APARTMENT (FULLY FURNISHED) WITH A PANORAMIC VIEW OF THE CITY AND THE SEA ON THE 16TH LEVEL OF PLATINUM ONE KINGSURY RESIDENCES-BAGATALE ROAD-COLOMBO-03-FOR LEASE

This luxury commercial cum residential building is situated facing the Galle road & bordering Bagatale road in a highly commercialized &  well secured convenient location  with close proximity to supermarkets, shopping malls, leading International & local schools, several diplomatic missions & five star hotels, also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc. 
 
DESCRIPTION 
 
It is a luxury & spacious three bed roomed apartment situated on the sixteenth floor of  the building & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, three spacious bed rooms including a master bed room, all with  an elegant pantry area with fitted cupboards & a maids room with a separate toilet. 
 
FACILITIES 
 
The apartment is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with central air conditioning, has pipe borne water supply with centralized hot water facilities & an centralized overhead tank for storage, has centralized cooking Gas supply as well, the inner doors & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer sliding windows are fitted with powder coated Aluminum frames, the sitting, dinning & the bed rooms are fitted with imported light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & consists of individual shower cubicles. 
 
The building consists of many common facilities (and is exclusively maintained by the Kingsbury Hotel) such as 24 hour security, two lifts, a standby generator, parking facilities swimming pool, a restaurant,a gym, a spa, laundry & valet services regular maintenance & garbage disposal facilities etc.etc.

description:

ඔබත් ඔබගේ පවුලේ ප්‍රියදරයන් සමග එලබෙන නිවාඩු සමය සීතල නුවරඑළියේ ගත කිරීමට බලාපොරොත්තු වනවානම් මෙන්න ඔබට සරිලන කදිම නවාතැනක් අප වෙතින්... 
'' Green Agro Farm Holiday Bungalow '' 
ඉතා සාධාරණ සහ පහසු මිල ගණන් යටතේ පවුලේ සියලු දෙනාට සුවසේ විවේකය ගත කිරීමට මෙය හොදම ස්ථානයයි. 
ග්‍රේගරි වැව සමීපයේ සිට මීටර් 500ක දුරින්, නුවරඑළිය නගරයට කි.මි 1.5ක දුරින් පිහිටි අපගේ මෙම බංගලාව සියළු පහසුකම් වලින් යුක්තය. 
ග්‍රෙගරි වැවට ඇවිද යා හැකි දුර සිමාවේහි පිහිටයි... 
ඔබගේ විවේකි නිවාඩුව ඔබට රිසි පරිදි ඔබගේ හිත මිතුරන්ද සමගින් නිදහස්ව විදගැනීමේ අවස්ථාව සහිත වන අතර සුව පහසු කාමර සහ නාන කාමර පහසුකම් , ප්‍රනීත අහාර පාන , රථ ගාල් පහසුකම් සමගින් සුන්දරත්වයෙන් සපිරි දර්ශණ සහ මනරම් ග්‍රෙගරි වැවටද මුහුණලා පිහිටයි.... 
විශාල ප්‍රමාණයේ නිදන කාමර 03 ක් , සියළු පහසුකම් සහිත නාන කාමරයක් , සියළු උපකරණ සහ පහසුකම් සහිත මුළුතැන්ගෙයක් , විසිත්ත කාමරය , උද්‍යානය සහ සේවක/රියදුරු කාමරය ද සහිතය  
ඉතා පහසුවෙන් 20 දෙනෙකු සදහා නවාතැන් පහසුකම් ලබා ගැනීමේ හැකියාව සහිතය. 
 
ඔබගේ නිවාඩු දිනයන් අදම වෙන් කරවා ගැනීමට නොපමාව අප අමතන්න....

ඉතා පිරිසිදු ඔප්පු , ජලය විදුලිය ඇත 
 
- අඹේපුස්ස ප්‍රධාන දුම්‍රිය ස්ථානයට මිනිත්තු දෙකක කෙටි දුරක්ද කි.මි. 3.5 ක වරකාපොළ නගරයට ( නුවර - කොළඹ පාර ) දුරද , ඉතා සීඝ්‍රයෙන් ඉදිවෙමින් පවතින කොළඹ - නුවර අධිවේගි මාර්ග පිවිසුමට කි.මි. 2 යි 
මීරිගම නගරයට කී.මී. 3 
 
මෙම ඉඩම 
නිවසක් සෑදීමට සුදුසුයි , කණු හිටවන ලද වැටක් , මුරකාමරයක් සහ ජලය , විදුලිය ඇත 
මහල් නිවාස ඉදිකිරිමට , දුම් රිය ස්ථානය ළඟ නිසා නිවාස වලට වැඩි ඉල්ලුමක් ඇත

බෝග වගා කිරීමට හෝ ඉතා වටිනා බෝග වගා කිරීමටද ඉතා සුදුසුයි

කොළොන්නාව නගරයෙන් වටිනා බිම් කොටසක් නිවසක් සමග ඉක්මනින් විකිණීමට. 
 
කොළඹ දිස්ත්‍රික්කයේ කොළොන්නාව නගරයෙන්, ඔරලෝසු කණුව හන්දියෙන් සියළු පහසුකම් සහිත පර්චස් 13 ක  බිම් කොටස සමග නිවස විකිණේ. කොළඹ ජාතික රෝහල (කි.මී. 6), ජාතික පාසල් (මධ්‍ය විද්‍යාල ආදී), ප්‍රධාන පෙළේ බැංකු (මහජන බැංකුව, සම්පත්, කොමර්ෂල් සහ ලංකා බැංකුව ආදී), පොලිස් ස්ථානය, වෙළඳ පොළ, ඉන්ධන පිරවුම් හල්, රාජ්‍ය ආයතන, පෞද්ගලික ආයතන ආදීයෙන් සමන්විත වූත්, වැදගත් ස්ථානයකි.පිටකොටුව-අවිස්සාවේල්ල පාරට ඇවිදින දුරින් මෙම ස්ථානය පිහිටා ඇත. විදුලිය, නල ජලය, පුළුල් මාර්ග ආදී යටිතල පහසුකම් සපිරි ස්ථානයකි. ඔබේ ආයෝජනයටත්, පදිංචියටත් ඔබ සොයන තැනක්.  ව්‍යාපාරික ගොනැගිලලක් ඉදිකිරීමට ද ඉතා සුදුසුය. ස්වභාවික ආපදා වලින් තොර ස්ථානයකි.  
වර්ග අඩි 1200 පමණ නිදන කාමර 4කින් යුත් නිවස සාලය, මුළුතැන්ගෙය සහ පැන්ට්‍රිය, සේවක නාන කාමරයකින් ද සමන්විතයි. නිවස හැර ඉඩමේ වටිනාකමට ඉක්මනින් විකිණේ.  
 
ඕලන්ද යුගයට අයත් නිදන ඇදක් ද (දිග අඩි 7 යි පළල අඩි 5½) විකිණීමට ඇත. 
 
මිල : පර්චසයක රු. 4,500,000 (මිල සාකච්ඡා කරගත හැකිය).

අනුරාධපුර දිස්ත්‍රික්කයේ, අනුරාධපුර නගරයේ ධර්මපාල මාවතෙන් පර්චස් 8.86 ක ඉඩම සමග අංග සම්පූර්ණ නව දෙමහල් නිවස වහාම විකිණේ. මෙම ස්ථානයට ආසන්නව ජනප්‍රිය පාසල්, ප්‍රාදේශීය මහ ලේකම් කාර්යාලය, පොලිස් ස්ථානය, මූලික රෝහල, පෞද්ගලික රෝහල් ආදී ස්ථාන වලටත් නුදුරින් මෙම ස්ථානය පිහිටා ඇත. තවද අනුරාධපුර බස් නැවතුම්පල, ප්‍රධාන පෙළේ බැංකු, තැපැල් කාර්යාලය, රෝහල, පුඩ් සිටි, ඉන්ධන පිරවුම් හල්, වෙළඳ පොල ආදී ස්ථාන වලට ද නුදුරු ස්ථානයකි. වර්ග අඩි 2500 පමණ වන නිවස නිදන කාමර 4, සාලය, කෑම කාමරය, මුළුතැන්ගෙය, විවෘත ආලින්දය, යාබද නාන කාමර 2  සහ වැසිකිළිය ආදියෙන්  සමන්විතයි. විදුලිය, පිරිසිදු ජලය, දුරකතන පහසුකම් ආදී සියළු යටිතල පහසුකම් වලින් සමන්විත පදිංචියට සුදුසු මනරම් වටපිටාවකින් යුත් වැදගත් ස්ථානයකි. බැංකු ණය ලබාගත හැකි පිරිසිදු ඔප්පු සහිතයි. පදිංචියට මෙන්ම ආයෝජනයට ද කදිමයි.

title: land for sale in nugegoda

ගම්පහ දිස්ත්‍රික්කයේ නිට්ටඹුව නගරයට සමීපව පර්චස් 89.5 ඉඩම සමග නිවාස 2 ක් විකිණේ. 
 
ගම්පහ, කිරිදිවැල-නිට්ටඹුව මාර්ගයට කිලෝමීටරයක් දුරින් වල්පොල හන්දියෙන් හග්ගල්ල - එල්ලක්කල පාරට සමීපව පර්චස් 89.5 ක ඉඩම සමග නිවාස දෙකක් විකිණීමට ඇත. මෙහි සිට නිට්ටඹුව නගරයට කිලෝමීටර 4ක් ද, කිරිදිවැල නගරයට කිලෝමීටර 8 ක් ද වේ. ප්‍රධාන පෙළේ පාසල් (ඌරාපොල, නිට්ටඹුව සහ කිරිදිවැල මධ්‍ය විද්‍යාල වලට සමීප) වලට කෙටි කාලයකින් ළඟාවිය හැකිය. වතුපිටිවල රෝහලට කිලෝමීටර 2 ක් ද වන අතර පුඩ් සිටි, බැංකු, ඉන්ධන පිරවුම්හල්, රාජ්‍ය සහ පෞද්ගලික ආයතන, වෛද්‍ය මධ්‍යස්ථාන ආදී ස්ථාන ද නුදුරින් පිහිටා ඇත. මාස් ලීනියා ඇක්වා (පුද්) සමාගම, ලංකා කැනරීස් (පුද්) සමාගම සහ දම්රෝ (පුද්) සමාගම ආදී පුද්ගලික ආයතනවලට ද ආසන්නයි.  
 
සශ්‍රීක පොල් ගස්, රඹුටන්, අඹ, කෙසෙල් මෙන්ම කොස් වැනි වටිනා දැව වර්ග මෙහි වගාකර ඇත.  
 
මෙම ඉඩමේ නිවාස 2 ක් ඉදිකර තිබේ. වර්ග අඩි 1200 ක් පමණ වන නිවස නිදන කාමර 4 ක්, නාන කාමරය, විවෘත ආලින්දය සහිත සාලය, කෑම කාමරය, මුළුතැන්ගෙය, වැසිකිළිය ආදී පහසුකම් වලින් යුක්තයි. මෙහි ඇති අනෙක් නිවස වර්ග අඩි 1100 ක් පමණ වන අතර නිදන කාමර 2, සාලය, කෑම කාමරය, මුළුතැන්ගෙ ආදී පහසුකම් වලින් සමන්විතයි.  
 
විදුලිය, ජලය, අන්තර්ජාල පියෝ ටීවී පහසුකම් සහිත දුරකතන  සහ පුළුල් මාර්ග ආදී සියළු යටිතල පහසුකම් වලින් සපිරි මනරම් නිදහස් පදිංචියටත් ආයෝජනයටත්, කෘෂිකාර්මික ව්‍යාපෘතියකට ඉතා සුදුසු ස්ථානයකි. මෙහි දැක්වෙන වෙල් යාය ද අවශ්‍ය නම් මිලදීගත හැකිය.

title: modern elegant apartment for sale
description:
Softlogic Properties (Pvt) Ltd, a fully owned subsidiary of Softlogic Holdings PLC, brings city dwellers its latest affordable luxury apartment to Colombo’s most prestigious residential area- De Fonseka Road, Colombo 5, featuring 6-floors with 25 state-of-the-art, eco-friendly units ranging from two to five bedroom spaces. 
 
The apartment provides residents with the highest convenience as it offers easy access to many of the city’s reputed banks, supermarkets, hospitals, restaurants, recreational services, and especially leading schools within a 2 km radius such as Visaka, Holy Family Convent, Isipathana, St Paul’s, Srimavo, St Peter’s, Royal, Thurstan. 
 
Everest Apartments truly offer a first-class living experience for city dwellers. Its strategic location, luxury amenities, elegant building design and landscaped garden roof terrace among so many others makes it an irresistible investment which will only appreciate significantly over time. With a CMC/RDA planned 30ft roadway linking the apartment complex with R A De Mel Mawatha it will only provide more convenience and a greater access in the future.

This newly built, 2-story house with contemporary design is located in a well secured and convenient location in Wickramasinghepura Battaramulla, in close proximity to Overseas School and the national Parliament. The surrounding area is residential, tranquil, and highly peaceful.  With easy access to all the essential amenities such as supermarkets, banks, schools, hospitals, leisure centers, recreational areas, transportation, and highways, this property would offer a unique combination of ideal living conditions to anyone with preference to living in a relaxed and restful environment, yet with easy access to other prominent towns and commercial interests.

• Land area: 14 p.

• 4 bathrooms 
• Separate washing machine area with cloth drying area. 
• Visitor’s toilet in living area.

• Dual vehicle entrance to the property from the main road. 
• Spacious 2 vehicle garage with remote controlled roller shutter door.

title: code no 2689-hotel for sale-nilaveli
description:
AN ON GOING NINE ROOMED RESORT HOTEL SITUATED CLOSE TO THE NILAVELI BEACH-TRINCOMALEE-FOR SALE 
 
LOCATION 
 
This hotel is situated in a tranquil & peaceful location surrounded by an echo friendly environment about 150 meters from the Nilaveli beach, about 20 Km from the Trincomalee town center, with all main amenities within a radius of about 500 meters from the hotel with banks, supermarkets, schools, hospitals & the post office nearby, it is a popular most sort out Tourist location with the golden sand beach nearby with swimming, boating, snorkeling & surfing facilities, it is only about fifteen minutes drive to Trino town & close to most of the towns in & around the Eastern province of Sri Lanka, from this location. 
 
DESCRIPTION 
 
The hotel is situated on 56 pchs of land, consists of four buildings two storied building consisting of five Non Ac double rooms on the ground floor & four Air conditioned double rooms on the upper floor, the second building consists of a restaurant with dinning facilities for about 50 pax, the third building consists of a fully equipped spacious kitchen area & the forth building consists of staff accommodation. 
 
GARDEN 
 
It has a large landscaped garden area with parking facilities for about six vehicles on one side,with a high parapet wall for two sides & a green esh fence fopr the other two sides. 
 
FACILITIES 
The hotel consist of Red cemented flooring,has single phase electricity supply with four air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for most of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with & an overhead tank for storage, all of the doors, windows & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood,all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & the building is solidly built using quality material. . 
 
OTHER  FACILITIES 
 
Featuring free WiFi and a sauna, nilaveli palm house offers pet-friendly accommodation in Nilaveli. The bed and breakfast has a terrace and a private beach area, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free private parking is available on site. Certain units include a seating area where you can relax. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. All rooms include a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower. Bike hire and car hire are available at this bed and breakfast and the area is popular for snorkeling. A selection of activities are offered in the area, such as diving, cycling and fishing. 
 
SUITABLE FOR 
 
Ideally suited for a profitable tourism operation

title: code no 2687-house lease-battarmulla
description:
A THREE BED ROOMED LUXURY AND SPACIOUS HOUSE (FULLY FURNISHED) AT ROHANA MAWATHA-SUBUTHIPURA-BATTARAMULLA-FOR LEASE 
 
LOCATION 
 
This house is situated in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential & well secured convenient location down Rohana mawatha-Subuthipura situated with close proximity to the passport office,the Education ministry also to supermarkets,shopping malls, the O erseas school & other leading International & local schooto banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc,it is only about fifteen minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location. 
 
DESCRIPTION 
 
It is an architect designed luxury & spacious two storied house facing a wide roadway,the ground floor consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room,two bed roomsa semi attached bathathroom,another visitors bathroom, an elegent pantry area with fitted cupboards & a servant room with a separate toilet outside. The upper floor consits of a spacious master bed room with a seperate lounge & a terrace area. 
 
GARDEN 
 
It has a medium sized landscaped front garden area with aa small swimming pool &  a double car porch surrounded by a high parapet wall, an automated roller door & a small wicket gate for the main entrances.  
 
FACILITIES 
 
The house consists of wooden & cut cement flooring, has three phase electricity supply with six air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for most of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with a pressure pump & hot water supply with two overhead tanks for storage, all of the doors, windows & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the sitting, dinning & the bed rooms are fitted with imported light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware,the upper floor consists of high roofed polished wooden ceiling with exposed rafters, the house conisits of a CCTV securiy system with eight camras,wired for piped music  & is solidly built using quality material.

title: bolagala floating resort-investment opportunity
description:
Bolagala Floating Resort is the first ever floating resort in Sri Lanka. The resort is built on a 13-acre man-made lake that overlooks a beautiful scenery.  
The resort consists of 50 floating cabanas, including 10 GPS tracker equipped cabanas that could freely move around the picturesque lake. As this is Sri Lanka’s first ever floating resort it is destined to attract many tourists, and investing in a cabana will be a lucrative plan. 
The resort will feature a floating pool, island’s first ever underwater spa, gym, tennis court that can be converted into a helipad, karaoke lounge and bar, electric cars to go around the resort and through a breathtaking waterfall, and an organic farm that are all maintained by the management. 
Investors are encouraged to take a look at the Investment Plan available on the Bolagala Floating Resort’s main web page investbolagala.com or you can email to info@investbolagala to get a better understanding of the different opportunities available for them.

The house consist of 3 bedrooms, with  3 attached  bathrooms, Solar Hot water, large sitting area  with granite flooring , Dining hall, kitchen with cupboards, pantry area, TV area, garage for 2 vehicles, servant quarters and bathrooms built on 35 perches land. 
 
Security is at high level with two main entrances with gates and the boundary demarcated with walls. The large garden promote peaceful living and ideal for garden lovers. Beach lovers could visit the nearby beach within 15 minutes. 
 
The location gives convenient access to drive to Jaela interchange of Airport High way within 10 minures, 15 minutes to Jaela town and 20 minutes to the Airport. Ideal for Executives or for foreign personnel employed at Free Zone or at the airport.

title: luxury house for sale in piliyandala
description:
Property details 
 
Private and Peaceful Living, Carefully Constructed at Dampe, Piliyandala 
 
If you are looking for a peaceful living away from city hassle, but with all the facilities a city can offer…, we Asha Lanka constructions have the perfect home for you... 
 
We believe that a building a house is sacred and this house being our very first offering, stands for our belief and will be the evident for a lot more yet to come...  
 
With the specialty gained from 25 years of experience in hardware industry, the founder of Asha Lanka Construction has carefully selected the most durable and reliable material to provide you a home which is luxury and trouble free… 
 
Property details 
 
• 9 perches land within the Lake Serenity Residencies Scheme, in front of Dampe Village Hotel, guaranteeing security and privacy. 
• 5 comfortable bedrooms (3 upstairs, 2 downstairs) of 2900 sq.ft.  
• 3 bathrooms, master bathroom includes a bathtub. 
• 1 servant/driver room 
• 2 slot parking space  
• Upstairs relaxing / reading verandah available  
• Walking distance to gym and swimming pool facilities 
 
Our Key Specialties 
 
• Designed by a renowned architect and structural engineering done by renowned structural engineer.  
• All electrical and plumbing work done with professional supervision. 
• All taps and faucets are of highest quality brands with 5-year warranty 
• House equipped with 2000L water tank and an additional 2000L sump to withstand a water cut. 
• Solar powered energy efficient hot water system. 
 
Seize the opportunity now and be an owner of an investment which lasts for generations.

title: code no 2684-house for sale-dehiwela
description:
A LUXURY AND SPACIOUS FOUR BED ROOMED HOUSE (UPGRADED FROM THE ORIGINAL PLAN) AT LOTUS GROVE-CAPT SUMDU RAJAPAKSHE MAWATHA (OFF HILL STREET)-DEHIWELA-FOR SALE  
 
LOCATION 
 
This house is situated in  one of the exclusive residential complexes situated by a lake in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential & well secured location down Hill street with access roadways from Attidiya & Mt.Lavina as well,& is situated with close proximity to supermarkets, leading international & local schools, also to hospitals, banks, places of worship & the post office. It is only about half hours drive to the Colombo city center from this location & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs. 
 
DESCRIPTION 
 
It is an architect designed luxury & spacious house (upgraded with an additional room & a floor from the original plan) with medium sized landscaped front & rear garden areas, the ground floor consists of a front inner verandah area, a spacious sitting & dinning room, one bed room with an attached bathroom, an elegant open pantry area with fitted cupboards, a separate kitchen with fitted cupboards too & a separate servants toilet outside, the upper floor consists of three bed rooms including an extra large master bed room (two rooms combined together) wan attached bathroom. with an attached bathroom, another semi attached bathroom for the other two bed rooms& one front balcony area, the top floor consists of a large hall cum entertainment area with  
 
GARDEN 
 
It has a medium sized landscaped front garden area with an open car porch & a medium sized rear garden area surrounded by a high parapet wall with an automated roller door & a smaller steel door, for the main entrances.  
 
FACILITIES 
 
The house consists of Terrazzo & plywood wooden flooring,has three phase electricity supply with seven air conditioners (two for the master bed room) & fitted ceiling fans for most of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water supply with an overhead tank for storage, all of the doors, windows & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the sitting, dinning & the bed rooms are fitted with imported light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware, the master bed room consists of large built in cupboards, the hall area on the top floor consists of large wall mirrors cupboards,the the house is solidly built using quality material. 
 
The house is elegantly furnished with quality furniture & equipped with all electrical appliances which are included for the sale. 
 
The housing complex consists of many common facilities such as a swimming pool, Badminton courts,Squash courts, children’s play area,24 hour security, a mini supermarket, regular maintenance & garbage disposal etc.

title: code no 2682-houes for lease-mt.lavinia
description:
A BRAND NEW THREE UNIT SPACIOUS HOUSE SITUATED DOWN MANTHRIMULLA ROAD-ATTIDIYA-MOUNT LAVINIA-FOR LEASE   
LOCATION 
This house is situated in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential & well secured convenient location down Manthrimulla road (about 100 meters from the Bekariya junction) (junction at the end of Templars road-Mt.Lavinia with easy access from Dehiwela & Nugegoda via Attidiya Main road) & is situated with close proximity to supermarkets,schools,the Rathmalana airport & Air force camp,also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc,it is only about forty minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location. 
DESCRIPTION 
It is an architect designed luxury & spacious three unit house with a spacious cement tiled front garden area & a spacious common roof top area with a magnificent view,the ground floor consists of two identically built two bed roomed apartments, each unit  consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room two bed rooms, a visitors bathroom, an elegent pantry area with fitted cupboards. 
The upper floor consists of a spacious front balcony, a spacious sitting & dining area, three bed rooms including a spacious master bed room & two common bathrooms, there is a spacious common roof top terrace area with a magnificent view over the upper floor.  
GARDEN 
It has a medium sized cement tiled  front garden area & a small backyard area, surrounded by a high parapet wall with an automated roller door & a smaller steel doors on either side for the main entrances.  
FACILITIES 
The house is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with three separate meters ,provisions for air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for most of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water supply by Solar power & an three overhead tanks for storage, all of the doors, windows & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the sitting, dinning & the bed rooms are fitted with imported light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & the house is solidly built using quality material.

title: bungalow for sale - 2 fully furnished and tiled apartments
description:
2 Fully furnished and tiled apartments within a two storey bungalow in Nuwara Eliya, for sale. The bungalow is located 3.5km away from the town. All floors are tiles and all windows are furnished with blackout curtains. There are 2 bedrooms, shower room, kitchen, dining room and parking space per floor. The bungalow offers a breathtaking view of tea plantation thanks to its location on top of a small hill. 
 
SHOWER ROOM: White fitted tiles with matching W/C includes a pedestal wash hand basin, shower and European style bidet with electric shower providing hot water. All fittings have been imported from Italy.  
 
KITCHEN: Kitchen with an array of eye level and base units finished in cream satinwood with an integrated electric oven and a half bowl sink and drainer. 
 
DINING ROOM:  There is a dining table seating 6 people with cupboards and pantries fitting into the room 
 
BEDROOMS: 1 bedroom contains a double bed and a single bed, whilst the other bedroom contains two single beds. All bedrooms are furnished with covers, wardrobes and cloth hanging rails.  
 
EXTERNALLY: To the side of the property there is a large area providing parking for several cars. There is also pedestrian and vehicular access to the back of the property and into the ground floor kitchen.

title: code no 2681-house for sale-piliyandala
description:
A BRAND NEW FIVE BED ROOMED LUXURY HOUSE SITUATED DOWN KURUNDUWATTE ROAD-MAMPE-PILIYANDALA-FOR SALE 
 
LOCATION 
 
This house is situated in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential & well secured  location down Kurunduwatte road in Mampe (about 500 meters from the Piliyandala junction) & is situated  ith close proximity to supermarkets,schools,also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc,it is only about half hours drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location. 
 
DESCRIPTION 
 
It is an architect designed luxury & spacious two storied house with a medium sized landscaped garden area,the ground floor consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, two bed rooms, a visitors bathroom,an elegant pantry area with fitted cupboards & a servant room with a separate toilet,the upper floor consists of a sitting area cum TV lounge,three bed rooms including a spacious master bed room with an attached bathroom, another common bathroom & a front balcony area, the top floor consists of a small sitting room & a spacious roof top terrace area with a magnificent view. 
 
GARDEN 
 
It has a medium sized landscaped front garden area & a small landscaped rear garden area, surrounded by a high parapet wall & an enclosed single car porch on the font side with an automated roller door & a small grilled door for the main entrances. 
 
FACILITIES  
 
The house is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with provisions for air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for most of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water supply with an overhead tank for storage,all of the doors, windows & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the sitting, dinning & the bed rooms are fitted with imported light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & the house is solidly built using quality material. 
 
  
 
SUITABLE FOR 
 
  
 
Ideally suited for anyone who likes to live in a brand new house close to the town.

title: code no 2680-house for lease-ja ela
description:
A LUXURY AND SPACIOUS FOUR BED ROOMED HOUSE (FULLY FURNISHED) SITUATED FACING OLD NEGOMBO ROAD-WELIKETIYA-JA ELA-FOR LEASE 
 
LOCATION 
 
This house is situated in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential & well secured convenient location facing Old negombo road about 03 Km from Thudella junction,about 16 Km from Negombo & about 01 Km to the beach (with easy access from Colombo-Fort via Negombo road,via the Katunayake expressway or on can a l road via Bopitiy a) & is situated close proximity to supermarkets, shopping malls, leading International & local schools, also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc,it is about fourty minutes drive to Colombo (shorter duration via the expressway) & close to most of the towns along the Colombo-Chilaw highway, from this location. 
 
DESCRIPTION 
 
It is an architect designed luxury & spacious two storied house with a large landscaped garden,the ground floor consists of a spacious sitting room,a seperate dinning room with a courtyard, a pond & a water fall, one bed room, with an attached bathroom, an elegent pantry area with fitted cupboards & a servants toilet outside.  
 
The upper floor consists of a sitting room with a void overlooking the ground floor, three bed rooms including a spacious master bed room,a common bathroom & two balcony areas including a spacious front terrace area overlooking the garden. 
 
GARDEN 
 
It has a small large  landscaped front garden area & a medium sized landscaped rear garden area, surrounded by a high parapet wall for three sides & a grilled fence with a high steel double gate for the main entrance.  
 
FACILITIES 
 
The house is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with provisions for air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for most of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water supply as well as well water supply with an overhead tank for storage, all of the doors, windows & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the sitting, dinning & the bed rooms are fitted with imported light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware, the ground & upper floors consists of high roofed polished wooden ceiling with exposed rafters,the house is solidly built using quality material.

This apartment is situated on the 26th floor of the Emperor residencies (adjoining the Cinnamon Grand Hotel & other prestigious apartment complexes such as the Crescat, Monarch & the Iceland residencies) in one of the most sort after luxury residential & commercialized & well secured convenient locations in Colombo with several five star hotels & diplomatic missions in the vicinity & also situated with close proximity to supermarkets, banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office,restaurants etc.etc, it is only about five minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location. 
 
  
 
DESCRIPTION 
 
It is a luxury & spacious three bed roomed apartment & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, three spacious bed rooms including a master bed room all with an en suite bathroom, an elegant open pantry area with fitted cupboards, a maids room with a separate toilet & three balcony areas with a magnificent view of the city & the sea   . 
 
FACILITIES 
 
The apartment is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with four split type air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for most of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities & an centralized overhead tank for storage,inner doors & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer sliding windows are fitted with powder coated Aluminum frames, the sitting, dinning & the bed rooms are fitted with imported light fittings,all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & consists of individual shower cubicles. 
 
The building consists of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, three levels of parking facilities, two lifts, a standby generator, a common roof top terrace area with a club house with a magnificent view of the city & the sea, a swimming pool (on ground level as well as on the roof top terrace), a gym ,regular maintenance & garbage disposal facilities (plus most of the facilities of the Cinnamon grand hotel such as laundry & valet services, could be utilized at concessionary rates by the occupants) 
 
  
 
SUITABLE FOR 
 
  
 
Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats,

title: rest house for sale
description:
BRAND NEW REST HOUSE FOR SALE - RAJINKA REST, ANURADHAPURA 
A newly opened rest house with square feet of 3200 sq ft (in the new building only), and a total of 54perches of land, is situated in the Heart of the Sacred City of Anuradhapura and is now available for sale, to any urgent buyers who are interested in this offer… 
Building… 
It has 5 rooms of size 24'*13' with private attached bathrooms, AC and hot water lines etc. Each room has a private sitting area apart from the common porch (16'*20').  There is also a large conference hall of size 26'*26'. Please note that the foundation for another 5 rooms of same size has been laid, and is ready for construction. 
All fittings including Burma Teak doors, Aluminum tinted windows, tiles, bathroom fittings, wire, switch board, safety switches, cables are imported! 03phase electricity and telecom phone line, 
Water supply… 
Water is never a shortage here. The rest house is provided with good, clean water either from the National Water Supply or straight from the large private well. Filtered and purified water is available. 
Ownership… 
This property has a clear deed and is out of any external interference. It has an approved Commercial permit from the urban council of Anuradhapura. It’s the only personal, legalized Rest House present in the Watawanndana Road. 
 
Finally… 
The garden is wide enough to park up to 10 vehicles at a time. About 165 feet of land is facing the main road. It’s a very peaceful place with tourists and travelers. It’s at a walking distance from the Religious monuments and Historical Sites (Samadhi Buddha Statue, Twin Pond, Abhayagiriya Stupa, Stone Bridge, Moon Stone).   
All Legal documents are available at request. We are looking for anyone to sale it urgently. If anyone is interested in this offer, please contact us on 071 220 1995 or leave us a mail on ajithart1@gmail.com.

title: 4 bedroom, 2 storey fully tiled house for sale in malabe
description:
A 4 bed room fully tiled, 2 storey house with all facilities for sale. It is situated between the Neville Fernando Hospital, (Horizon College / Medical Faculty) on one side and the SLIIT Campus (and Amawathura Temple) on the other side. The entry to the Southern Highway is only about 5 minutes away. 
It has 3 up-stair bedrooms and one room down stairs. There are 2 toilets upstairs (one of which is attached with hot water) and another one downstairs. A servant's toilet is also available behind the house on the ground floor.  A roofed space is available at the back of the house that can be used if necessary for extra cooking facilities.  
The total floor area is around 2500 sqft. There is a large lounge downstairs and a slightly smaller one upstairs. There is a utility/maid’s room downstairs. A small garden is available at the front.  It is complete with a perimeter wall surrounding the whole house. 
There are rain canopies made with Poly Carbonate sheets over the windows to safeguard against rain water. There are 2 balconies at the front and back similarly covered up. All the windows are protected with anti-theft security iron grills although there are no known robberies in the area. 
There is room for parking of 3 vehicles including one under the car porch. It is a compact house with all the facilities in a lovely environment with respectable and friendly neighbourhood. 
This is an ideal place for a family with children. Please contact on mobile 0712 793366 for further details.

title: 4 bedroom, 2 storey fully tiled house for sale in malabe
description:
A 4 bed room fully tiled, 2 storey house with all facilities. It is situated between the Neville Fernando Hospital, (Horizon College and Medical Faculty) on one side and the SLIIT Campus (and Amawathura Temple) on the other side. 
It has 3 up-stair bedrooms and one room down stairs. There are 2 toilets upstairs (one of which is attached with hot water) and another one downstairs. A servant's toilet is also available behind the house on the ground floor.  A roofed space is available at the back of the house that can be used if necessary for extra cooking facilities. There is a large lounge downstairs and a slightly smaller one upstairs. There is a utility/maid’s room downstairs. A small garden is available at the front.  It is complete with a perimeter wall surrounding the whole house. 
There are rain canopies made with Poly Carbonate sheets over the windows to safeguard against rain water. There are 2 balconies at the front and back similarly covered up. All the windows are protected with anti-theft security iron grills although there are no known robberies in the area. 
There is room for parking of 3 vehicles including one under the car porch. It is a compact house with all the facilities in a lovely environment with respectable and friendly neighbourhood. 
This is an ideal place for a family with children. Please contact on mobile 0712 793366 for further details.
